ch.unifr.pai.twice.layout.client.mobile
Class MobileLayout

java.lang.Object
  ch.unifr.pai.twice.layout.client.DynamicLayout
      ch.unifr.pai.twice.layout.client.mobile.MobileLayout

public class MobileLayout
extends DynamicLayout

The mobile layout mechanism - currently used for all touch based devices.

Author:
Oliver Schmid

getRootPanel

protected com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Panel getRootPanel()
Overrides:
getRootPanel in class DynamicLayout
Returns:
the root panel which shall be the initial hook to attach the components. By default, this is the RootLayoutPanel but it can be overridden by subtypes if necessary
